Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox

package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox
Mailbox storage abstraction for mail access protocols.

This package provides common interfaces for accessing mailbox contents, shared across multiple mail access protocols including POP3 and IMAP.

Core Interfaces

  • Mailbox - Interface for single mailbox operations
  • MailboxStore - Interface for multi-folder mail stores (IMAP)
  • MailboxFactory - Factory for creating mailbox/store instances
  • MessageDescriptor - Interface for message metadata
  • SimpleMessageDescriptor - Basic implementation for POP3
  • IMAPMessageDescriptor - Extended interface for IMAP
  • MailboxNameCodec - Encodes mailbox names for filesystem safety

Mailbox Name Encoding

Mailbox names may contain Unicode characters (e.g., "Données", "日本語") and characters that are invalid on certain filesystems. The MailboxNameCodec class provides encoding/decoding using a modified Quoted-Printable format:

  • All non-ASCII characters are encoded as UTF-8 bytes in =XX hex format
  • Path separators (/, \) are always encoded
  • Windows-forbidden characters (/: * ? " < > \) are encoded
  • The escape character (=) itself is encoded

This ensures mailbox names are safely stored on all major filesystems (Unix, Windows, macOS) while preserving the original Unicode names.

Usage Patterns

POP3 (Single Mailbox)


 MailboxFactory factory = new MboxMailboxFactory(new File("/var/mail"));
 Mailbox mailbox = factory.createMailbox();
 mailbox.open(username);
 // Access messages...
 mailbox.close(true); // expunge deleted messages

IMAP (Multiple Mailboxes)


 MailboxFactory factory = ...;
 MailboxStore store = factory.createStore();
 store.open(username);
 
 // List mailboxes
 List<String> folders = store.listMailboxes("", "*");
 
 // Open a specific folder
 Mailbox inbox = store.openMailbox("INBOX", false);
 // Access messages, flags, search...
 
 store.close();

Available Implementations

  • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.mbox - Standard Unix mbox file format

Protocol Support

Feature Support by Protocol
FeaturePOP3IMAP
Single mailbox✓✓
Multiple mailboxes✗✓
Message flagsDeleted onlyFull support
Message search✗✓
Append messages✗✓
Copy/Move✗✓

    Enumeration of standard IMAP message flags.

    Extended message descriptor for IMAP-specific metadata.

    Email address structure.

    MIME body structure for a message or part.

    Message envelope containing parsed RFC 2822 headers.

    Interface for accessing mailbox contents.
    MailboxAttribute
    Enumeration of IMAP mailbox attributes.
    MailboxFactory
    Factory interface for creating mail store instances.
    MailboxNameCodec
    Encodes and decodes mailbox names for safe filesystem storage.
    MailboxStore
    Interface for a mail store containing multiple mailboxes.
    MailboxStore.Quota
    Quota information for a quota root.
    MessageContext
    Context providing access to message data during search evaluation.
    MessageDescriptor
    Interface describing a message in a mailbox.
    MessageSet
    Represents an IMAP message set (sequence set or UID set).
    MessageSet.Range
    A range within a message set.
    ParsedMessageContext
    A MessageContext implementation that parses message content using MessageParser to extract searchable data.
    SearchCriteria
    Search criteria for IMAP SEARCH command (RFC 9051 Section 6.4.4).
    SimpleMessageDescriptor
    Simple implementation of MessageDescriptor for basic mail access.
    StoreAction
    Enumeration of IMAP STORE command actions.
